Text:
And there we have it people.. as of last night (july 4), season 1 of RHOV is officially over, and now all episodes are uploaded. 

Comments appreciated, as always. :)

Looks like it's been picked up for a season 2.
Thanks for posting the whole season, the Canadian one is the best go figure?!
Thanks!! Glad to hear it's been picked up for season 2 also.
Thank you as always for bringing this to us.  Can't wait to see what Season 2 holds.  This show is so bad you just have to watch it.  lol
